en: The Rise and Fall of Mecha-Perón
es: El auge y la caída de Mecha-Perón

en:
After losing WWII, mad Japanese scientists built a giant automaton. It was created after Argentinean rising leader, Juan D. Perón.

Sadly, the AI implanted in the Mecha went rogue and started to wreak havoc on the Japanese capital city.

You command the path of destruction of Mecha-Perón. Have fun.
es:
Luego de perder la II Guerra Mundial, científicos locos japoneses construyeron un autómata gigante. Fue creado en homenaje al flamante líder argentino, Juan D. Perón.

Lamentablemente, la IA implantada en el Mecha se descontroló y empezó a destruir la capital japonesa.

Controlás el camino de destrucción de Mecha-Perón. Divertite.

en:
Disclaimer:

The events and characters depicted in this videogame are completely ficticious. Any similarity to actual people, living or dead, is purely coincidental.
es:
Aviso:

Los eventos y personajes que aparecen en este videojuego son completamente ficticios. Cualquier semejanza con personas reales, vivas o muertas, es coincidencia pura.

en: Your path of destruction ends at:
es: Tu camino de destrucción termina a los:

THANK YOU ADAM ATOMIC FOR THIS AWESOME FLIXEL

WE <3 JAPAN, we're not making any joke with the latest events.*

*(Refers to 2011's Fukushima earthquake, when the game was originally released)



This game was made for the ADVA's CODEAR "Perón"compo. ADVA is the Argentine Association of Videogame Developers. Thanks for playing!

It was our first completed project as a team and we're very happy with the outcome. Viva Perón!
